colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012B (CES 'PHAGS YUL PAn CHEN KUN GYIS GTZUG NOR SLOB DPON MTHO BTZUN GRUB RJES MDZAD PA'I KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS BSTOD KYI MCHAN 'GREL NGO MTSAR GTAM GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, BYANG PHYOGS SA MTHA'I RIGS SMRA BA'I GZUGS BRNYAN SU DH'I: WA G'INDRAS, 'DI 'DRA ZHIG YOD NA RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM DAG LA GO BDE BAR 'GYUR RAM SNYAM TE SNAG SHOG 'GRON DU BGYIS PA LA 'KHRUL NOR GANG YOD GZUR GNAS MKHAS PA RNAMS LA SNYING NAS BSHAGS SO,, ,,) THUGS BRTZE BA CHEN POS BZOD PA MDZAD PA MKHYEN MKHYEN,, ,,MANGGA LAm,, ,,
